A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: No story\, major plot holes\, no character depth\, major real world political agenda pushing\, etc... Star wars was a way people were able to bond and come together despite race\, religion\, or personal opinions. Now with this new direction they're going in it become a heavily one sided political platform. There's no story to it thanks to that\, and the plot holes it caused were everywhere. They unfortunately \"Marry Sue'd\" Rey who had great potential to be a strong\, memorable character if they put the time and effort to develop her character. They also did Luke dirty. He deserved much better than that.
